content.query:
USE epd_ldw
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.england') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.england;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.england (
	[YEAR][INT] NULL,
	[MONTH][INT] NULL,
	[REGIONAL_OFFICE_NAME][varchar](500) NULL,
	[REGIONAL_OFFICE_CODE][varchar](500) NULL,
	[ICB_NAME][varchar](500) NULL,
	[ICB_CODE][varchar](500) NULL,
	[PCO_NAME][varchar](500) NULL,
	[PCO_CODE][varchar](500) NULL,
	[PRACTICE_NAME][varchar](500) NULL,
	[PRACTICE_CODE][varchar](500) NULL,
	[ADDRESS_1][varchar](500) NULL,
	[ADDRESS_2][varchar](500) NULL,
	[ADDRESS_3][varchar](500) NULL,
	[ADDRESS_4][varchar](500) NULL,
	[POSTCODE][varchar](500) NULL,
	[BNF_CHEMICAL_SUBSTANCE][varchar](500) NULL,
	[CHEMICAL_SUBSTANCE_BNF_DESCR][varchar](500) NULL,
	[BNF_CODE][varchar](500) NULL,
	[BNF_DESCRIPTION][varchar](500) NULL,
	[BNF_CHAPTER_PLUS_CODE][varchar](500) NULL,
	[QUANTITY][FLOAT] NULL,
	[ITEMS][INT] NULL,
	[TOTAL_QUANTITY][FLOAT] NULL,
	[ADQUSAGE][FLOAT] NULL,
	[NIC][FLOAT] NULL,
	[ACTUAL_COST][FLOAT] NULL,
	[UNIDENTIFIED][varchar](500) NULL
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = '/refined/**',
    DATA_SOURCE = epd_src,
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
	)


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM silver.england
